'''Friends the World Over''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to achieve a total of 10,000 dialogue option interactions when speaking with NPCs.

==Gameplay Notes==
*Objects that can be interacted with count as NPCs. It's unknown if the object needs to have "dialogue" or not.
*These do not need to be unique dialogue choices.
